metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1942 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities inactionscript/Jplayer.as in the Flash SWF component (jplayer.swf) in jPlayerbefore 2.2.20, as used in ownCloud Server before 5.0.4 and other products,allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1)jQuery or (2) id parameters, as demonstrated using document.write in thejQuery parameter, a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-2022 andCVE-2013-2023.

criterions.comment: jquery-jplayer package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
